atten_specific_annex1¶

pycraf.atm.atten_specific_annex1(freq_grid, press_dry, press_w, temp)[source] [edit on github]¶

Specific (one layer) atmospheric attenuation according to ITU-R P.676-11, Annex 1.

Parameters
freq_gridQuantity

Frequencies at which to calculate line-width shapes [GHz]

press_dryQuantity

Dry air (=Oxygen) pressure [hPa]

press_wQuantity

Water vapor partial pressure [hPa]

tempQuantity

Temperature [K]

Returns
atten_dryQuantity

Dry-air specific attenuation [dB / km]

atten_wetQuantity

Wet-air specific attenuation [dB / km]

Notes

No integration is done between freq_grid positions, so if you’re interested in high accuracy near resonance lines, make your freq_grid sufficiently fine.
